Pre-Game Insights: Ian Happ and the Chicago Cubs will hit the field at Wrigley Field against the Cincinnati Reds and Elly De La Cruz on Friday.
The Cubs are 19th in MLB action with 170 home runs, averaging 1.1 per game.
The Reds have an 8.7 K/9 this season as a pitching staff, ranking 12th in the majors.
